mapper.insert: insert into ORDERS(ORDERID, ID, SHIPREQ, INPUTDATE, ACTUAL_PRICE, STATUS) values(concat('or_',lpad(seq_orders.nextval,7,0)),#{id},#{shipReq},to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),#{actualPrice}, '주문완료')
insert into ORDER_DETAIL(ORDER_DETAILID, TOTALCNT, ORDERID, PRODUCTID,CARTID) values(concat('od_',lpad(seq_order_detail.nextval,7,0)),#{totalPrdCnt},#{orderId},#{prdId},#{cartId, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into DESTINATION(DESID, ID, RECEIVER, PHONE, ZIPCODE, ADDR, ADDR_DETAIL, DEFAULT_FLAG,NAME) values(concat('des_',lpad(seq_destination.nextval,6,0)) ,#{id},#{receiver},#{receiver_phone},#{zipcode},#{addr},#{addrDetail},#{defaultFlag, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ship_name})
mapper.select: SELECT o.ORDERID,p.NAME,od.TOTALCNT, m.NAME, d.ZIPCODE, d.ADDR, d.ADDR_DETAIL, d.RECEIVER, d.PHONE, o.SHIPREQ, o.ACTUAL_PRICE FROM ORDERS o, ORDER_DETAIL od, PRODUCT p, DESTINATION d, MEMBER m WHERE (od.ORDERID = o.ORDERID and od.PRODUCTID = p.PRODUCTID and o.ID = m.ID and d.ID = m.ID) and o.ORDERID= #{orderId} and p.productId = #{productId}
mapper.delete: delete from cart c where exists (select * from ORDER_DETAIL d where d.cartid = c.cartid)
